BootstrapActions.Name: Install Rail-RNA and create JAR dependencies

Steps.Name: Align reads and segment them into readlets
Search for junctions using readlet alignments
Filter out junctions violating confidence criteria
Get transcriptome elements for read realignment
Associate spliced reads with junction coverages
Finalize primary alignments of spliced reads
Merge exon differentials at same genomic positions
Compile sample coverages from exon differentials
Write bigWigs with exome coverage by sample
Write BEDs with junctions/indels by sample
